body: Hello everyone, I got a quick question. In daylight analysis you often take a picture with a fisheye view and lay a sun diagram on top of it. I have a geometry in rhino and would like to set the view to watch the sky from a certain point in my model; rotate it so the bottom is alligned to south and then render a fisheye picture. (like in the picture attached) Do you know if there is a simple way to achieve this or even a component in Ladybug/Honeybee that already does this? Thank you very much Thomas [](http://www.bartenbach.com/uploads/tx_userconTandJSPic/Sonnenstandsdiagramm_740x555.jpg)
topic: "Sun Diagram" or Watch the sky but with context in it
